K09bsu014_u:465: sa yāvanmahānagarānuprāptaye kuśalo bhavatyanuccalita eva prathamānmārgāntarasthānāt /
K09bsu014_u:466: sa evaṃ jñānavicāritayā buddhyā mahāpathyodanasamṛddhyā anupūrveṇa mahāsārthena sārdhaṃ yāvanmahānagaramanuprāpnoti,
K09bsu014_u:467: na cāṭavīkāntāradoṣaiḥ sārthasya vā ātmano vāsyopaghātaḥ saṃpadyate /
K09bsu014_u:468: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ kuśalo mahāsārthavāho yadā prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:483: ca parimārgate parigaveṣate buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ ca sakāśāt /
K09bsu014_u:487: na saṃsāraṭavīkāntāradoṣaiḥ sattvasārthasya vā ātmano vā asyopaghātaḥ saṃpadyate /
K09bsu014_u:488: tasmāttarhi bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvena aparikhinnena bhūmiparikarmaparikarmaviśeṣābhiyuktena bhavitavyam /
K09bsu014_u:489: ayaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya prathamāyāḥ pramuditāyā bodhisattvabhūmermukhapraveśaḥ samāsato nirdiśyate //
K09bsu014_u:490: yo 'syāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena jambūdvīpeśvaro bhavati mahaiśvaryādhipatyapratilabdho
K09bsu014_u:491: dharmānurakṣī kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvān mahātyāgena saṃgrahītukuśalaḥ sattvānāṃ mātsaryamalavinivṛttaye
K09bsu014_u:493: yacca kiṃcitkarmārabhate dānena vā priyavadyatayā vā arthakriyayā vā samānārthatayā vā,
K09bsu014_u:496: kimiti? sarvasattvānāmagryo bhaveyaṃ śreṣṭho jyeṣṭho varaḥ pravara uttamo 'nuttamo nāyako vināyakaḥ pariṇāyako yāvatsarvajñajñānapratiśaraṇo bhaveyam iti /
K09bsu014_u:497: ākāṅkṣaṃśca tathārūpaṃ vīryamārabhate yathārūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa sarvagṛhakalatrabhogānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajati /
K09bsu014_u:498: pravrajitaśca san ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena samādhiśataṃ ca pratilabhate samāpadyate ca /
K09bsu014_u:510: tathā uttare praṇidhānabalikā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣikatayā vikurvanti yeṣāṃ
K09bsu014_u:511: na sukarā saṃkhyā kurtuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā ṛdvervā cakṣuṣo vā gocarasya vā svarasya
K09bsu014_u:512: vā caryāyā vā vyūhasya vā adhiṣṭhānasya vā adhimuktervā abhisaṃskāraṇāṃ vā yāvadevatāvadbhirapi
K09bsu014_u:517: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suparikarmakṛto dvitīyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimabhilaṣati,
K09bsu014_u:520: yaduta ṛjvāśayatā ca mṛdvāśayatā ca karmaṇyāśayatā ca damāśayatā ca śamāśayatā ca kalyāṇāśayatā ca asaṃsṛṣṭāśayatā ca anapekṣāśayatā ca udārāśayatā ca māhātmyāśayatā ca /
K09bsu014_u:522: tato dvitīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vimalāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhavati //
K09bsu014_u:523: tatra bhavanto jinaputrā vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyaiva daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:526: nihatadaṇḍo nihataśastro nihatavairo lajjāvān dayāpannaḥ sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu hitasukhānukampī maitracittaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:529: adattādānātprativirataḥ khalu punarbhavati svabhogasaṃtuṣṭaḥ parabhogānabhilāṣī anukampakaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:530: sa paraparigṛhītebhyo vastubhyaḥ paraparigṛhītasaṃjñī steyacittamupasthāpya antaśastṛṇaparṇamapi nādattamādātā bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:533: sa paraparigṛhītāsu strīṣu parabhāryāsu gotradhvajadharmarakṣitāsu abhidhyāmapi notpādayati,
K09bsu014_u:534: kaḥ punarvādo dvīndriyasamāpatyā vā anaṅgavijñaptyā vā //
K09bsu014_u:535: anṛtavacanātprativirataḥ khalu punarbhavati satyavādī bhūtavādī kālavādī,
K09bsu014_u:537: so 'ntaśaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi vinidhāya dṛṣṭiṃ kṣāntiṃ ruciṃ matiṃ prekṣāṃ visaṃvādanābhiprāyo nānṛtāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati,
K09bsu014_u:540: sa netaḥ śrutvā amutrākhyātā bhavatyamīṣāṃ bhedāya /
K09bsu014_u:541: na amutaḥ śrutvā ihākhyātā bhavatyeṣāṃ bhedāya /
K09bsu014_u:544: na vyagrārāmo bhavati na vyagrarato na vyagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate sadbhūtāmasadbhūtāṃ vā //
K09bsu014_u:546: sa yeyaṃ vāgadeśā karkaśā parakaṭukā parābhisaṃjananī anvakṣānvakṣaprāgbhārā grāmyā
K09bsu014_u:547: pārthagjanakī anelā akarṇasukhā krodharoṣaniścāritā hṛdayaparidahanī manaḥsaṃtāpakarī
K09bsu014_u:549: tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya yeyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manaāpakaraṇī
K09bsu014_u:550: hitakaraṇī nelā karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇīyā paurī varṇavispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā
K09bsu014_u:551: niśritā bahujaneṣṭā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanaāpā vijñāpannā (Dbh 16)
K09bsu014_u:552: sarvasattvahitasukhāvahā samāhitā manautplāvanakarī manaḥprahlādanakarī svasaṃtānaparasaṃtānaprasādanakarī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati //
K09bsu014_u:553: saṃbhinnapralāpātprativirataḥ khalu punarbhavati suparihāryavacanaḥ kālavādī bhūtavādī arthavādī dharmavādī nyāyavādī vinayavādī /
K09bsu014_u:554: sa nidānavatīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate kālena sāvadānam /
K09bsu014_u:555: sa cāntaśa itihāsapūrvakamapi vacanaṃ parihārya pariharati,
K09bsu014_u:557: anabhidhyāluḥ khalu punarbhavati parasveṣu parakāmeṣu parabhogeṣu paravittopakaraṇeṣu /
K09bsu014_u:563: sarvasattveṣu maitracitto hitacitto dayācittaḥ sukhacittaḥ snigdhacittaḥ sarvajagadanugrahacittaḥ sarvabhūtahitānukampācittaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:564: sa yānīmāni krodhopanāhakhilamalavyāpādaparidāhasaṃdhukṣitapratighādyāni tāni prahāya yānīmāni hitopasaṃhitāni maitryupasaṃhitāni sarvasattvahitasukhāya
K09bsu014_u:567: sa imān daśa kuśalān karmapathān satatasamitamanurakṣan evaṃ cittāśayamabhinirharati
K09bsu014_u:570: hanta ahamātmanaiva samyakpratipattisthitaḥ parān samyakpratipattau sthāpayiṣyāmi /
K09bsu014_u:572: asthānametadanavakāśo yadātmā vipratipattisthitaḥ parān samyakpratipattau sthāpayet,
K09bsu014_u:574: sa evaṃ pravicinoti - eṣāṃ daśānāṃ akuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ samādānahetornirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatayaḥ prajñāyante /
K09bsu014_u:575: punaḥ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ samādānahetormanuṣyopapattimādiṃ kṛtvā yāvadbhavāgramityupapattayaḥ prajñāyante /
K09bsu014_u:576: tata uttaṃra ta eva daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāṃ prajñākāreṇa paribhāvyamānāḥ prādeśikacittatayā
K09bsu014_u:579: tata uttarataraṃ pariśodhitā aparapraṇeyatayā svayaṃbhūtvānukūlatayā svayamabhisaṃbodhanatayā
K09bsu014_u:584: tata uttarataraṃ pariśodhitāḥ sarvākārapariśodhitatvādyāvaddaśabalabalatvāya sarvabuddhadharmāḥ samudāgamāya saṃvartante /
K09bsu014_u:585: tasmāt tarhyasmābhiḥ samābhinirhāre sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K09bsu014_u:586: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - ime khalu punardaśākuśalāḥ karmapathā
K09bsu014_u:591: dvau vipākāvabhinirvartayati alpāyuṣkatāṃ ca bahuglānyatāṃ ca /
K09bsu014_u:592: adattādanaṃ ... peyālaṃ ... parīttabhogatāṃ ca sādhāraṇabhogatāṃ ca /
K09bsu014_u:601: evaṃ khalu mahato 'parimāṇasya duḥkhaskandhasya ime daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samudāgamāya saṃvartante /
K09bsu014_u:602: hanta vayaṃ imān daśākuśalān karmapathān vivarjya dharmārāmaratiratā viharāma /
K09bsu014_u:603: sa imān daśākuśalān karmapathān prahāya daśakuśalakarmapathapratiṣṭhitaḥ parāṃsteṣveva pratiṣṭhāpayati /
K09bsu014_u:606: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - kudṛṣṭipatitā bateme sattvā viṣamamatayo viṣamāśayā utpathagahanacāriṇaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:615: mahāmohatamastimirapaṭalāvidyāndhakārāvṛtā bateme sattvā mahāndhakāragahanānupraviṣṭāḥ prajñālokasudūrībhūtā mahāndhakārapraskannāḥ kudṛṣṭikāntārasamavasṛtāḥ
K09bsu014_u:622: te 'smābhirevaṃvidhāt saṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgāduttārayitavyā abhayapure ca sarvajñatānagare nirupadrave nirupatāpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:628: te 'smābhirmahākaruṇākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave 'rajasi kṣeme śive 'bhaye sarvabhayatrāsāpagate sarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ
K09bsu014_u:635: te 'smābhiḥ paramasukhe sarvaniketavigame pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā yaduta sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇanirvāṇe
K09bsu014_u:636: / hīnalīnadīnādhimuktā bateme sattvā agryasarvajñajñānacittavikalāḥ sati niḥsaraṇe mahāyāne śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāvatīrṇamatayaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:638: iti hi bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ śīlabalādhānānugatasya bodhisattvasya kṛpākaruṇāmaitryabhinirhārakuśalasya
K09bsu014_u:640: vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhitasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsabhāgacchānti ... audārika
K09bsu014_u:643: teṣāṃ ca sakāśebhyo gauraveṇemāneva daśa kuśalān karmapathān pratigṛhṇāti,
K09bsu014_u:645: so 'nekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatāni anekāni kalpasahasrāṇi anekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi
K09bsu014_u:648: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ kāsīsaprakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvamalāpagataṃ bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:649: evameva bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ kāsīsaprakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvamalāpagataṃ bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:650: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'syāṃ vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito 'nekān
K09bsu014_u:653: tasya caturbhyaḥ saṃgrahavastubhyaḥ priyavadyatā atiriktatamā bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:655: na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam //
K09bsu014_u:656: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya vimalā nāma dvitīyā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
K09bsu014_u:657: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rājā bhavati cakravartī caturdvīpādhipatidharmādhipatyapratilabdhaḥ
K09bsu014_u:658: saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāṃ dauḥśīlyamalavinivartanāya kuśalaḥ
K09bsu014_u:664: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo dvitīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau supariśodhitādhyāśayastṛtīyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākramati,
K09bsu014_u:667: yaduta śuddhacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca sthiracittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca nirviccittāśayamanaskāreṇa
K09bsu014_u:668: ca avirāgacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca avinivartacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca dṛḍhacittāśayamanaskāreṇa
K09bsu014_u:669: ca uttaptacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca atṛptacittāśayamanaskāreṇa ca udāracittāśayamanaskāreṇa
K09bsu014_u:672: sa khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvastṛtīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito 'nityatāṃ ca sarvasaṃskāragatasya yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,
K09bsu014_u:673: duḥkhatāṃ ca aśubhatāṃ ca anāśvāsikatāṃ ca vipralopatāṃ ca acirasthitikatāṃ ca kṣaṇikotpādanirodhatāṃ
K09bsu014_u:674: ca pūrvantāsaṃbhavatāṃ ca aparāntāsaṃkrāntitāṃ ca pratyutpannāvyavasthitatāṃ ca sarvasaṃskāragatasya pratyavekṣate /
K09bsu014_u:675: sa evaṃbhūtaṃ sarvasaṃskāragataṃ saṃpaśyannanabhisaraṃ nirākrandaṃ saśokaṃ saparidevaṃ
K09bsu014_u:677: ca ātmabhāvaṃ saṃpaśyan bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvasaṃskārebhyaścittamuccālayati,
K09bsu014_u:680: atulyatāṃ ca aprameyatāṃ ca durāsadatāṃ ca asaṃspṛṣṭatāṃ ca nirupadravatāṃ ca nirupāyāsatāṃ ca abhayapuragamanīyatāṃ ca apunarāvṛttitāṃ ca bahujanaparitrāṇatāṃ ca samanupaśyati /
K09bsu014_u:681: sa evamapramāṇatāṃ ca tathāgatajñānasya samanupaśyan evaṃ bahūpadravatāṃ ca sarvasaṃskāragatasya vyupaparīkṣamāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā sattvānāmantike daśa cittāśayānupasthāpayati /
K09bsu014_u:689: sa evaṃ bahūpadravaṃ sattvadhātuṃ samanupaśyan evaṃ vīryamārabhate - mayaivaite sattvāḥ
K09bsu014_u:690: paritrātavyāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ paritoṣayitavyāḥ saṃropayitavyā vinetavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
K09bsu014_u:691: sa evaṃ nirvidanugataśca sarvasaṃskāragatyā upekṣānugataśca sarvasattveṣu anuśaṃsānugataśca
K09bsu014_u:693: - katamena khalu upāyamārgeṇa śakyā ime sattvā evaṃ bahuduḥkhopakleśaprapatitā abhyuddhartum,
K09bsu014_u:698: sa ca sarvadharmayathāvadavabodho nānyatra apracārānutpādacāriṇyāḥ prajñāyāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:702: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣitajñāno bhūyasyā mātrayā saddharmaparyeṣaṇābhiyukto viharati /
K09bsu014_u:704: dharmārāmo dharmarato dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmanimno dharmapravaṇo dharmaprāgbhāro dharmaparāyaṇo dharmalayano dharmatrāṇo dharmānudharmacārī
K09bsu014_u:705: sa evaṃ buddhadharmaparyeṣaṇābhiyukto nāsti tatkiṃcid dravyavittajātaṃ vā dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārajātaṃ
K09bsu014_u:708: na ca tasmādduṣkarasaṃjñī bhavati anyatra tasminneva dharmabhāṇakapudgale duṣkarasaṃjñī bhavati yo 'syaikadharmapadamapi deśayati /
K09bsu014_u:709: sa dharmahetornāsti tatkiṃcidupātaṃ bāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati /
K09bsu014_u:712: nāsti sā kācid mānābhimānotsarganirmāṇopacāratā yāṃ nopādatte /
K09bsu014_u:713: nāsti sā kācitkāyikī pīḍā yāṃ nopādatte /
K09bsu014_u:716: sa citro bhavatyekasubhāṣitagāthāśravaṇena na tveva cakravartirājyapratilambhena /
K09bsu014_u:717: sa citro bhavatyaśrutadharmapadaśravaṇena bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanena na tveva śakratvabrahmatvapratilambhena bahukalpaśatasahasraparyavasānena
K09bsu014_u:718: sacedidaṃ kaścidevaṃ brūyāt - evamahaṃ tulyamidaṃ dharmapadaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhopanītaṃ bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanaṃ saṃśrāvayeyam,
K09bsu014_u:721: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - utsahe 'hamekasyāpi dharmapadasya samyaksaṃbuddhopanītasya bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanasyārthāya
K09bsu014_u:727: yathāśruteṣu dharmeṣu ca yoniśaḥ pratyavakṣeṇajātīyo bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:728: tāṃśca dharmān śrutvā svacittanidhyaptyā eko rahogata evaṃ mīmāṃsate - dharmānudharmapratipattyā ime buddhadharmā anugantavyā na kevalaṃ vākkarmapariśuddhyeti
K09bsu014_u:729: so 'syāṃ prabhākaryāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo dharmānudharmapratipattihetorviviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśaladharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ
K09bsu014_u:730: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K09bsu014_u:731: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotībhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati
K09bsu014_u:733: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yattadāryā ācakṣante - upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān /
K09bsu014_u:735: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K09bsu014_u:737: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramādanantaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānānantyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K09bsu014_u:739: sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramānnaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati tenānabhiratipadasthānena nānyatra dharmānudharmapratipattimupādāya
K09bsu014_u:741: sarvatrānugatena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati /
K09bsu014_u:750: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāraṃ parvatamapyasajjan gacchati tadyathāpi nāma ākāśe /
K09bsu014_u:751: ākāśe 'pi paryaṅkena krāmati tadyathāpi nāma pakṣiśakuniḥ /

K09bsu014_u:794: evaṃ] divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamanuṣyeṇa sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ sanimittaṃ sattvān paśyati /

K09bsu014_u:845: sa khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'syāmarciṣmatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito

K09bsu014_u:868: unmiñjitāni nimiñjitāni vicintitāni vitarkitāni kelāyitāni mamāyitāni dhanāyitāni niketasthānāni,

K09bsu014_u:1120: yānyapīmāni dvādaśa bhavāṅgāni tathāgatena prabhedaśo vyākhyātāni,
K09bsu014_u:1123: yasmin vastuni hi rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittamutpadyate tadvijñānam /
K09bsu014_u:1171: maraṇamapi dvividhakāryapratyupasthānaṃ bhavati - saṃskāravidhvaṃsanaṃ ca karoti,
K09bsu014_u:1183: evameva trivartma nirātmakamātmātmīyarahitaṃ saṃbhavati ca asaṃbhavayogena,
K09bsu014_u:1185: api tu khalu punaryaducyate - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityeṣā paurvāntikyapekṣā /
K09bsu014_u:1190: api tu khalu punastriduḥkhatā dvādaśa bhavāṅgānyupādāya /
K09bsu014_u:1207: sa evaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyavekṣate 'nulomapratilomaṃ yaduta bhavāṅgānusaṃdhitaśca
K09bsu014_u:1211: tasyaivaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya nirātmato niḥsattvato
K09bsu014_u:1217: tasyaivaṃ śūnyatānimittamavatīrṇasya na kaścidabhilāṣa utpadyate anyatra mahākaruṇāpūrvakātsattvaparipācanāt /
K09bsu014_u:1219: ya imāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayan ātmaparasaṃjñāpagato kārakavedakasaṃjñāpagato
K09bsu014_u:1226: hanta vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāḥ sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1228: evamasya bhavanto jinaputrāḥ saṃskāragataṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ svabhāvarahitamanutpannāniruddhaṃ
K09bsu014_u:1231: sa evaṃ jñānasamanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārāvabhāsito bodhyaṅgāhārakāṃśca pratyayānupasaṃharati /
K09bsu014_u:1235: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya avatāraśūnyatā ca nāma samādhirājāyate /
K09bsu014_u:1241: tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasyabhedyāśayatā ca paripūryate /
K09bsu014_u:1243: ... vimalāśayatā ... anantāśayatā ... jñānābhilāṣāśayatā ... upāyaprajñāsaṃprayogāśayatā ca paripūryate //
K09bsu014_u:1244: tasyaite daśa bodhisattvāśayāḥ svanugatā bhavanti tathāgatabodhau /
K09bsu014_u:1254: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya prajñāpāramitāvihāro 'tiriktatara ājāto bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1255: tīkṣṇā cānulomikī tṛtīyā kṣāntireṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathāvadanulomatayā na vilomatayā //
K09bsu014_u:1257: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya yathāvatsamāpattiprajñājñānālokatayā prayujyate,
K09bsu014_u:1260: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya anekān kalpāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni bhūyasyā mātrayā uttaptaprabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti /
K09bsu014_u:1263: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ vaiḍūryaparisṛṣṭaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptaprabhāsvarataraṃ bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1264: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānavicāritāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptaprabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti,
K09bsu014_u:1266: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāścandrābhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahlādayati asaṃhāryā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalībhiḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1267: evameva bhavanto jinaputra bodhisattvasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlānyanekeṣāṃ sattvakoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ kleśajvālāḥ praśamayanti,
K09bsu014_u:1270: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1271: na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
K09bsu014_u:1272: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya abhimukhī nāma ṣaṣṭhī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1273: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena sunirmito bhavati devarājaṃ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāmabhimānapratiprasrabdhaye kuśalaḥ sattvānyābhimānikadharmebhyo vinivartayitum /
K09bsu014_u:1274: asaṃhāryaśca bhavati sarvaśrāvakaparipṛcchāyāṃ kuśalaḥ sattvān pratītyasamutpāde 'vatārayitum /
K09bsu014_u:1279: vajragarbha āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suparipūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ saptamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākramati,
K09bsu014_u:1302: evirbhavanto jinaputrā daśabhirupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtibhirmārgāntarārambhaviśeṣairbodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭhyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ saptamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākrānta ityucyate //
K09bsu014_u:1324: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - evamapramāṇaḥ khalu punastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
K09bsu014_u:1325: viṣayo yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kalpakoṭiśatasahasrairyāvadetāvadbhirapi kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ /
K09bsu014_u:1327: sa evaṃ supratyavekṣitajñānābhijñaḥ satatasamitamabhiyuktopāyaprajñāparibhāviteṣu mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣeṣu supratiṣṭhito bhavatyavicālyayogena
K09bsu014_u:1330: tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi svapnāntaragato 'pyapagatanīvaraṇaḥ sarveryāpathe sthito 'virahito bhavati ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraiḥ
K09bsu014_u:1331: tasya sarvacittotpāde daśānāṃ bodhisattvapāramitānāṃ samudāgamaparipūriḥ samudāgacchati /
K09bsu014_u:1333: tathā hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sarvāṃścittotpādānutpannotpannān mahākaruṇāpūrvakān buddhadharmasamudāgamāya tathāgatajñānāya pariṇāmayati /
K09bsu014_u:1334: tatra yaḥ kuśalamūlasya sattvebhya utsargo buddhajñānaṃ paryeṣamāṇasya,
K09bsu014_u:1352: evamasya bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya imā daśa pāramitāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante /
K09bsu014_u:1357: samāsataḥ sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante //
K09bsu014_u:1358: evamukte vimukticandro bodhisattvo vajragarbhaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - kiṃ punarbho
K09bsu014_u:1359: jinaputrā asyāmeva saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgikā
K09bsu014_u:1362: vajragarbha āha - sarvāsu bho jinaputrā daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante,
K09bsu014_u:1365: iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ prāyogikacaryāparipūraṇī ca jñānābhijñānacaryākramaṇī ca /
K09bsu014_u:1366: api tu khalu punarbho jinaputrāḥ prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvapraṇidhānādhyālambena bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante
K09bsu014_u:1372: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvabodhyāṅgāni paripūryante /
K09bsu014_u:1374: yāni bodhisattvena prathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya yāvatsaptamī bodhisattvabhūmirityabhinirhṛtāni jñānābhinirhāraprayogāṅgāni,
K09bsu014_u:1376: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvayorlokadhātvoḥ saṃkliṣṭaviśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorekāntapariśuddhāśayaśca
K09bsu014_u:1377: lokadhātorlokāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahābhijñābalādhānāt,
K09bsu014_u:1378: evameva bho jinaputra vyāmiśrapariśuddhā bodhisattvacaryāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahāpraṇidhānopāyaprajñābhijñābalādhānāt
K09bsu014_u:1379: vimukticandra āha - kiṃ punarbho jinaputra saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu kleśacaryāsaṃkliṣṭā bodhisattvacaryā pratyetavyā?
K09bsu014_u:1380: vajragarbha āha - prathamāmeva bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya sarvābodhisattvacaryāpagatakleśakalmāṣā bodhipariṇāmanādhipatyena pratyetavyā
K09bsu014_u:1383: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra rājā cakravartī divyaṃ hastiratnamabhirūḍhaścaturo dvīpānākramati,
K09bsu014_u:1387: yadā punarmanuṣyāśrayaṃ hitvā brahmalokopapanno bhavati brāhmyavimānamabhirūḍhaḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1391: evameva bhoḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvaḥ pāramitāyānābhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran saṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
K09bsu014_u:1394: saptasu bhūmiṣu sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmeraṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavakrānto bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1395: tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānamabhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran sarvajagatsaṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
K09bsu014_u:1397: asyāṃ punarbho jinaputra sapyamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rāgādipramukhaṃ sarvakleśagaṇaṃ samatikrānto bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1398: so 'syāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau caran bodhisattvo 'saṃkleśāniṣkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:1399: tatkasmāt? asamudācārātsarvakleśānāṃ na saṃkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:1401: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo 'dhyāśayapariśuddhena kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1402: adhyāśayapariśuddhena vākkarmaṇā adhyāśayapariśuddhena manaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1405: ye ceme daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānubhāvitāḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1407: yāni laukikāni śilpasthānakarmasthānāni yānyabhinirhṛtāni pañcamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau,
K09bsu014_u:1409: sa ācāryaḥ saṃmato bhavati trisāhasra mahāsāhasralokadhātau,
K09bsu014_u:1412: nāsya kaścitsamo bhavatyāśayena vā prayogeṇa vā /
K09bsu014_u:1416: na ca tāvadvipākataḥ pariniṣpannāni bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya /
K09bsu014_u:1417: asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvacittotpādeṣu prajñopāyabhāvanābalaṃ paripūryate /
K09bsu014_u:1419: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san suvicitavicayaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvasamādhi samāpadyate /
K09bsu014_u:1429: sa evaṃpramukhāni mahābhijñājñānamukhāni paripūrṇāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi bhūmipariśodhikāni samāpadyate //
K09bsu014_u:1430: sa eṣāṃ samādhīnāmupāyaprajñāsupariśodhitānāṃ pratilambhānmahākaruṇābalena cātikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim,
K09bsu014_u:1432: tasya asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyakarma nimittāpagataṃ pravartate /
K09bsu014_u:1435: prathamāyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhacaryāṃ samatikrāntaṃ bhavati?
K09bsu014_u:1439: asyāṃ tu punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau svabuddhigocaravicārapratilambhādasaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairbhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1440: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā rājakulaprasūto rājaputro rājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato jātamātra eva sarvāmātyagaṇamabhibhavati rājādhipatyena,
K09bsu014_u:1442: yadā punaḥ sa saṃvṛddho bhavati tadā svabuddhibalādhānataḥ sarvāmātyakriyāsamatikrānto bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1445: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ svaviṣayajñānaviśeṣamāhātmyāvasthitatvātsarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakriyāmatikrānto bhavati
K09bsu014_u:1446: sa khalu punarbho bodhisattvo 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito gambhīrasya vivittasyāpracārasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo lābhī bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1450: vimukticandra āha - katamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate?
K09bsu014_u:1451: vajragarbha āha - ṣaṣṭhīṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /
K09bsu014_u:1452: asyāṃ (Dbh 40) punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
K09bsu014_u:1453: na ca nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti vaktavyaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:1454: tena so 'cintyena kāyavāṅmana skarmaṇā samanvāgata ityucyate /
K09bsu014_u:1455: āścaryaṃ bho yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
K09bsu014_u:1457: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra puruṣaḥ kuśalo mahāsāgare vārilakṣaṇābhijñaḥ paṇḍito
K09bsu014_u:1458: vyakto medhāvī tatropagatayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgato mahāsāgare mahāyānapātrābhirūḍho
K09bsu014_u:1462: evameva bho jinaputra asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñajñānamahāsāgarāvatīrṇaḥ pāramitāmahāyānapātrābhirūḍho bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
K09bsu014_u:1465: sa evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ samādhijñānabalabhāvanābhinirhṛtayā buddhyā mahatopāyaprajñābalādhānena saṃsāramukhaṃ cādarśayati /
K09bsu014_u:1486: tasyaivaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya asyāṃ saptasyāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti ... /
K09bsu014_u:1488: teṣāṃ ca sakāśādgauravacitrīkāreṇa satkṛtya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti,
K09bsu014_u:1499: anekāni kalpaśatāni ... anekāni kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlānyuttapyante,
K09bsu014_u:1503: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ tadeva jātarūpaṃ sarvaratnapratyuptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptataraṃ bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1506: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ ... tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptatarāṇi (Dbh 41)
K09bsu014_u:1509: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ sūryābhā asaṃhāryā bhavanti sarvajyotirgaṇacandrābhābhiścaturṣu mahādvīpeṣu,
K09bsu014_u:1512: evameva bho jinaputrā ... tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1515: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhya upāyakauśalyapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
K09bsu014_u:1516: na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
K09bsu014_u:1517: iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamā nāma saptamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
K09bsu014_u:1518: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena vaśavartī bhavati devarājaḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ
K09bsu014_u:1525: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu
K09bsu014_u:1531: ajātatāṃ ca alakṣaṇatāṃ ca asaṃbhūtatāṃ ca avināśitāṃ ca aniṣṭhitatāṃ ca apravṛttitāṃ
K09bsu014_u:1532: ca anabhinivṛttitāṃ ca abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ ca ādimadhyaparyavasānasamatāṃ ca tathatāvikalpasarvajñajñānapraveśatāṃ
K09bsu014_u:1535: tatra bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhādacalāyā
K09bsu014_u:1539: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā bhikṣurṛddhimāṃścetovaśipāramitāprāpto 'nupūrveṇa navamaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaḥ sarveñjitamanyanāspanditavikalpāpagato
K09bsu014_u:1540: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'syā aṣṭamyā acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ sahapratilambhātsarvābhogavigato
K09bsu014_u:1543: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato mahaughaprāptamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
K09bsu014_u:1547: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvaścaturmahaughaprāptaṃ sattvakāyaṃ saṃjānāna uttaraṇābhiprāyaḥ sarvajñajñānābhisaṃbodhāya mahadvyāyāmautsukyamārabhate
K09bsu014_u:1548: sa mahāvīryārambhaprāptaḥ samanantaramanuprāpta imāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ sarvābhogavigato bhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1549: tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dvayasamudācāro vā nimittasamudācāro vā nābhāsībhavati /
K09bsu014_u:1550: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā brahmalokopapattisthitaḥ kāmāvacarān kleśān na samudācarati,
K09bsu014_u:1551: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'calāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ sarvacittamanovijñānasamudācārānna samudācarati /
K09bsu014_u:1558: tasya khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugatasya

K09bsu014_u:3123: cittaṃ yathā anuśayā na ca dravyabhūto na ca deśasthā na ca vipravasanti āśayā /
K09bsu014_u:3124: durheya dhyānaviṣayānabhivartiyāśca chedaśca mārga vinayena na cānyamasti // 22 //
K09bsu014_u:3125: upapatti ṣaḍgati vibhaktipraveśataśca snehaṃ ca tṛṣṇamavidyāndhaka karmakṣetrā /
K09bsu014_u:3127: te vāsanāgati kileśa ca karma cittā suvihāratāya na punargatisanta kāmā /
K09bsu014_u:3129: evaṃ visaraṇagatāḥ sthita atra bhūmyāṃ sarvasattva āśaya yathendriya yādhimuktiḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3130: teṣāmarthe dharmavibhakti prakāśayanti pratisaṃvidarthakuśalāḥ pratibhā nirukti // 25 //
K09bsu014_u:3133: abhipravarṣanti madhuramamṛtasya varṣaṃ bhujagendrasāgara yathā anupūrayanti // 26 //
K09bsu014_u:3135: te dhāraṇī daśa asaṃkhyasahasra labdhā dhāranti dharma yatha (sāgara varṣadhārī) // 27 //
K09bsu014_u:3136: evaṃ ca dhāraṇiviśuddhisamādhiprāptā ekakṣaṇena daśabuddhasahasra dṛṣṭāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3140: toṣenti sarva yathaindriya-āśayāśca catudvīpasāgara varṣā sama modayanti // 29 //
K09bsu014_u:3143: deśeyu dharma sugatāḥ puna nānasattvaṃ śrutvā dharema yatha sarvada (bījadhārī) // 30 //
K09bsu014_u:3144: (yāvatakā) jagadiha praviśanti sattvāḥ (te sarva ekapariṣanmaṇḍale niṣaṇṇāśca) /
K09bsu014_u:3145: eṣāṃ ca ekakṣaṇi sarvi samotaritvā ekāṃ rutena imi tarpayitavya sarve // 31 //
K09bsu014_u:3148: rātriṃdivaṃ sada jinaiḥ śamathānuprāptā gambhīra śānta sthita jñānavimokṣadhīrā // 32//
K09bsu014_u:3152: tasya kleśagahanāni prabhā samājya brahmaṇo va dvisahasrikalokadhātuḥ // 33 //
K09bsu014_u:3171: vastrakaiḥ samakarī sagauravā bhrāmayanti rucirān varān śatam // 3 //
K09bsu014_u:3172: apsarā bahava prīṇitendriyāḥ pūjayanti sugataṃ sagauravāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3174: ekakṣetra sugato niṣaṇṇakaḥ sarvakṣetri pratibhāsa darśayī /
K09bsu014_u:3176: ekaromu sugatasya raśmayo niścaranti jagakleśa śāmyati /
K09bsu014_u:3184: garbhaprāpta bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu jāyamāna kvaci kṣetra dṛśyate // 8 //
K09bsu014_u:3185: niṣkramanta jagahetu nāyako budhyamāna puna bodhimuttamām /
K09bsu014_u:3188: māyakāra yatha vidyaśikṣito jīvikārtha bahukāya darśayī /
K09bsu014_u:3192: yatha svabhāvu sugatānagocarā sarvasattva tatha prāpta dharmatām /
K09bsu014_u:3194: ye tu jñāna sugatāna arthiṃke kalpakalpaparikalpavarjitam /
K09bsu014_u:3197: marukanyā jinaṃ lokya tūṣṇībhūtāḥ śame ratāḥ // 14 //
K09bsu014_u:3202: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ vyavalokya
K09bsu014_u:3203: dharmadhātuṃ ca vyavalokayan sarvajñatācittotpādaṃ ca saṃvarṇayan bodhisattvaviṣayamādarśayan
K09bsu014_u:3206: evameva bhūmyarthaṃ prarūpayamāṇo buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu014_u:3210: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
K09bsu014_u:3211: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /
K09bsu014_u:3215: yāva jina triyadhvā pūjanārthāya pūjaṃ khagapathapariṇāmaṃ śodhanaṃ sarvakṣetram /
K09bsu014_u:3216: samyaganugatārthe yāvatā sarvadharmān mokṣa jagata arthe jāyate bodhicittam // 20 //
K09bsu014_u:3223: pracalitaśubhakāryā dhīravīryotsahā ye nikhilajanahitārthe prodyayāmāna siṃhāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3225: avirataguṇasādhyā nirjitakleśasaṃghā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 24 //
K09bsu014_u:3227: śamasukhaniratā ye tyaktasaṃsārasaṅgā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 25//
K09bsu014_u:3229: jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakā ye sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 26 //
K09bsu014_u:3231: sugataguṇasamīhā ye ca puṇyānurāgāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 27 //
K09bsu014_u:3232: tribhuvanahitakāmā bodhisaṃbhārapūrye praṇihitamanasā ye duṣkare 'pi caranti /
K09bsu014_u:3233: avirataśubhakarmaprodyatā bodhisattvāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 28 //
K09bsu014_u:3235: anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 29 //
K09bsu014_u:3236: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu jinapadapraṇidhānāḥ satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu /
K09bsu014_u:3237: triguṇapariviśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu // 30 //
K09bsu014_u:3310: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
K09bsu014_u:3319: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
K09bsu014_u:3326: etāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsato nirdiṣṭāḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3327: tasyāṃ velāyāmayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
K09bsu014_u:3331: atha tasmin samaye bhagavāṃstān vimukticandrapramukhān sarvān bodhisattvānāmantrya
K09bsu014_u:3333: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā /
K09bsu014_u:3334: tadyūyaṃ sarve svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata,
K09bsu014_u:3336: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuḥpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhitiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K09bsu014_u:3340: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
K09bsu014_u:3341: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudāradharmasya
K09bsu014_u:3342: lābhinaḥ syuriti śraddhayā satkṛtya śrāvayiṣyanti śroṣyanti ca yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti ca /
K09bsu014_u:3343: pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
K09bsu014_u:3344: amātsaryacittatayā asya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā likhanāya vācanāya svādhyayanāya pūjanāya darśanāya dāsyati,
K09bsu014_u:3346: atha khalu bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayā anuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu014_u:3347: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā te 'rhantaḥ syuḥ śāriputreṇa tulyāḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3349: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuryādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3351: sarve 'pi pratyekajinā yadi syustān pūjayet kaścidihāpramattaḥ /
K09bsu014_u:3354: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryāt praṇāmamapi caikavāram /
K09bsu014_u:3355: prasannacitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhan tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // 4 //
K09bsu014_u:3356: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvāstān pūjayet yaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
K09bsu014_u:3357: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānuṣaiśca kalpānanekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // 5 //
K09bsu014_u:3358: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakāle tyaktvā svakāyaṃ ca tathātmajīvam /
K09bsu014_u:3359: dadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // 6 //
K09bsu014_u:3361: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicittam idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadātu // 7 //
K09bsu014_u:3363: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sa tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // 8 //
K09bsu014_u:3364: prabhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantām ekaṃ padaṃ vādi śatīhayaśca /
K09bsu014_u:3365: na vyañjanād grasyati nāpi cārthād dadāti yaḥ sūtramidaṃ parebhyaḥ // 9 //
K09bsu014_u:3366: anuttarāsau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścit sadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
K09bsu014_u:3367: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // 10 //
K09bsu014_u:3368: According the edition by Ryūkḥ Kondḥ (reproduced Kyoto 1983)
K09bsu014_u:3369: the end of the sūtra is:
K09bsu014_u:3370: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te vimukticandrapūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvagaṇā vaśavartidevarājapramukhāḥ
K09bsu014_u:3372: ca lokaḥ sā sarvāvatī parṣad bhagavato vajragarbhasya bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
K09bsu014_u:3374: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ //
K09bsu014_u:3375: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
K09bsu014_u:3376: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
